conversations.body_text: Hi Yvan Bergeron,  May I ask what brand your pedals are? Different pedal brands may use different connector types and wiring sequences, which could result in compatibility issues. Please refer to the link below for more information:      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498

Hi thank you for rapid answer.

I own a set of Sim Ruito pedals.


Envoyé de mon appareil Samsung de Bell via le réseau le plus vaste au pays.

Hi Yvan Bergeron,     That’s fine, but you will need a separate power supply.

Hi,

That's good of course the seperate power supply.

The control box should be the Plus X, but is there a difference when using the other one ?

Do my pedals should be plugged that control box ?

I suppose that no, because should not talk to other system. Am i wrong ?


Thank you and sorry for those questions ?

Hi Yvan Bergeron,     The Ruito pedal can be directly connected to our PlusX control board. In addition to an independent power supply, you will also need to purchase a VAM or VAM Pro vibration motor separately.
